title: EPSON Expression 1640XL
text: 42-bit color, professional scanner that can achieve up to 1600 x 3200 dpi hardware resolution. The scanning bed is 12.2" x 17.2".

title: EPSON Expression 10000XL
text: 48-bit color, professional scanner that can achieve up to 2400 x 4800 dpi hardware resolution. The scanning bed is 12.2" x 17.2".

title: EPSON Expression 11000XL
text: 48-bit color, professional scanner that can achieve up to 2400 x 4800 dpi hardware resolution. The scanning bed is 12.2" x 17.2".

title: EPSON Expression 12000XL
text: 48-bit color scanner that can achieve up to 2400 x 4800 dpi hardware resolution. The scanning bed is 12.2" x 17.2".

title: Fujitsu Fi-6770
text: 24-bit color document feed scanner that can achieve up to 1200 dpi. We use this scanner for larger documents that have many pages, as this machine is able to feed and scan large stacks of paper automatically.

title: Plustek OpticBook 3800
text: Book edge scanner designed to eliminate spine shadows when scanning books. This is a great scanner for books that we aren't allowed to cut the spine away from, as it allows us to get closer into the center of the book.

title: Contex Plus HD5450
text: Large format feed scanner designed for larger objects (like maps, portraits, blueprints, etc.). Depending on how fragile the materials being scanned are, we'll sometimes use protective mylar sheets with this machine (and it's often a two-person ordeal).
